column9:
Thank you for contacting overseasgifts.com. Our offices will be closed from 5.00pm the 23rd December 2014 and re-opening on the 6th January 2015. We will be dealing with all enquiries on our return and we thank you for your patience. We would like to wish you a Merry Christmas and a Happy New Year.

Kind regards

The overseasgifts.com team
